content:
Question 30 of 50
Single choice question
You have an Azure subscription
named Subscription1.
You deploy a Linux virtual machine
named VM1 to Subscription1
You need to monitor the metrics and
the logs of VM1.
What should you use?
Select the correct answer
Azure HDInsight
Linux Diagnostic Extension (LAD) 3.0
Azure Analysis Services
The Azure Performance Diagnostics extension
